name: CKMarkNotificationsReadOperation
desc: An operation that marks push notifications as read by your app.

items.name: init(notificationIDsToMarkRead: [CKNotification.ID])
items.desc: Creates an operation that marks the specified notifications as read.

items.name: var notificationIDs: [CKNotification.ID]?
items.desc: The array of notifications to mark as read.

items.name: var markNotificationsReadCompletionBlock: (([CKNotification.ID]?, Error?) -> Void)?
items.desc: The block to execute when the operation finishes.
